original_text: They attached the two ends of the two cords to the two settings of filigree. Thus they attached it in front to the shoulder pieces of the ephod.
korean_text: 그 땋은 두 사슬의 다른 두 끝을 에봇 앞 두 어깨받이의 금 테에 매고

sentences.original_text: They attached the two ends of the two cords
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 두 끈의 두 끝을 달았습니다

sentences.original_text: to the two settings of filigree.
Thus they attached it in front
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 그들은 그것을 앞쪽에 달았습니다

sentences.original_text: to the shoulder pieces of the ephod.
